You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
ENABLEMENT SITES (MYTRAILHEAD)
Maintain Content with Trailmaker Content

Use Trailmaker Content to keep your content current. For example, you can edit existing content to correct errors or update work processes. You also can add a unit to an existing module or add a module to an existing trail.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions


USER ROLES
This topic supports these enablement site roles:	
Content Creators
Release Managers
TIP Each time you add content to an unpublished release from Trailmaker Content, you’re prompted to download the backpack ZIP file containing the content. Store the backpack in your version control system (VCS) to keep the most recent version of the content available. You can also download the latest released version of the backpack from Trailmaker Release. When you’re ready to update your content, import the backpack into your Trailmaker Content workspace.
Revise Existing Content with Trailmaker Content
In Trailmaker Content, you can update content, correct errors, or revise metadata, such as a content title or applied filters.
Add a Unit to an Existing Module
You can add a unit to an existing module.
Add a Module to an Existing Trail
You can add a module to an existing trail.
Delete a Unit from a Published Module
You can delete a unit from a published module.
Delete a Module from a Published Trail
You can delete a module from an existing trail.
